Why is this major? Were there any noticable side effects?

This is a known problem that we believe is caused by the Tree holding on to 
elements that have been removed from the view.

Set to major because I got an error dialog which did not exactly explain the
havoc i.e. hard to asses at that point whether there was damage or not.

This code is all happening in the main thread so the viewer cannot be disposed 
while this code is running. Moving back to UI.

I don't think thee is anything we can do here in the next 38 hours <grin> but 
the Team guys had some good ideas.

We are no longer causing the visual side effects of this but we should see how 
it is getting into this state.

The update safe runnable should
-dump the element mapping
- dump the tree mapping
- do a clean up of disposed items afterwards so that this does not continue

This way we can perhaps figure out why this is happening.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 57093 ***
